item.description:
The Upper Valley 9/11 Truth Alliance reports:

We are bringing 9/11 Truth Movement scholar David Ray Griffin to Hanover to speak at Howe Library at 7 pm on Tuesday May 4, 2010, on the topic "Is the War in Afghanistan Morally Justified by 9/11?" Hope you'll want to hear this mesmerizing speaker, who is on a big NE tour this spring. Lecture is free and
open to the public.


Be sure to follow us on Twitter: mv911truth - we'll post details on this site and also tweet it out to you.
item.name: David Ray Griffin in Hanover
